languages.text: "{name}, какая удача, что вы пришли! Признаться, я и сама искала встречи. После событий на Даргонусе... мои плечи окутала антрацитово-серая мантия. Я долго размышляла о нашей первой встрече и о том, что произошло после. Не терпится сбросить этот утомительный цвет".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, какая удача, что вы пришли! Признаться, я и сама искала встречи. После событий на Даргонусе... мои плечи окутала антрацитово-серая мантия. Я долго размышляла о нашей первой встрече и о том, что произошло после. Не терпится сбросить этот утомительный цвет".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."
languages.original_text: "{name}, какая удача, что вы пришли! Признаться, я и сама искала встречи. После событий на Даргонусе... мои плечи окутала антрацитово-серая мантия. Я долго размышляла о нашей первой встрече и о том, что произошло после. Не терпится сбросить этот утомительный цвет".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was looking to meet you myself. After the events on Dargonus... a stone-coal grey mangle wrapped around my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. And I cannot wait to shake off this dreary color."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, you came! How wonderful!" Frankly, I myself was looking for a chance to meet. After the events on Dargonus... an anthracite gray robe wrapped around my shoulders. I thought long and hard about our first meeting and what happened after. And I can't wait to shed this tiresome color."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was looking to meet you myself. After the events on Dargonus... a stone-coal grey mangle wrapped around my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. And I cannot wait to shake off this dreary color."

And I cannot wait to shake off this dreary color."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

And I cannot wait to shake off this dreary color."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，能见到你，我真是太幸运了！我得承认，我刚刚也在找你。达戈努斯的事件过后……我感觉肩上仿佛压了一层煤烟般的灰色布幔。我花了很长时间思考我们第一次见面的情形，以及接下来发生的事情。我已经迫不及待想要摆脱这种沉闷的颜色了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，能见到你，我真是太幸运了！我得承认，我刚刚也在找你。达戈努斯的事件过后……我感觉肩上仿佛压了一层煤烟般的灰色布幔。我花了很长时间思考我们第一次见面的情形，以及接下来发生的事情。我已经迫不及待想要摆脱这种沉闷的颜色了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: ", it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

languages.text: «¡{name}, me alegro de que haya venido! Admito que le estaba buscando. Después de lo sucedido en Dargonus... era como si un manto de gris antracita hubiera caído sobre mis hombros. He pasado mucho tiempo meditando sobre nuestro primer encuentro y lo que sucedió a continuación. No veo la hora de desprenderme de este color tan lúgubre».
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}, me alegro de que haya venido! Admito que le estaba buscando. Después de lo sucedido en Dargonus... era como si un manto de gris antracita hubiera caído sobre mis hombros. He pasado mucho tiempo meditando sobre nuestro primer encuentro y lo que sucedió a continuación. No veo la hora de desprenderme de este color tan lúgubre».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、あなたが来てくださって本当に幸運でした！私はあなたを探し求めていたのです。ダルゴナスでの出来事の後…無煙炭色のマントが私の肩に降りかかったように感じたのです。私は、私たちの最初の出会いとその後について、長い間考えていました。この暗い色を振り払うのが待ちきれません」
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、あなたが来てくださって本当に幸運でした！私はあなたを探し求めていたのです。ダルゴナスでの出来事の後…無煙炭色のマントが私の肩に降りかかったように感じたのです。私は、私たちの最初の出会いとその後について、長い間考えていました。この暗い色を振り払うのが待ちきれません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, welch ein Glück, dass Ihr gekommen seid! Ich muss gestehen, ich war selbst auf der Suche nach Euch. Nach den Ereignissen auf Dargonus ... war mir, als hätte sich ein anthrazitgrauer Mantel auf meine Schultern gelegt. Ich habe lange über unsere erste Begegnung nachgedacht — und darüber, was danach geschehen ist. Ich kann es kaum erwarten, diese triste Farbe abzuschütteln."
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, welch ein Glück, dass Ihr gekommen seid! Ich muss gestehen, ich war selbst auf der Suche nach Euch. Nach den Ereignissen auf Dargonus ... war mir, als hätte sich ein anthrazitgrauer Mantel auf meine Schultern gelegt. Ich habe lange über unsere erste Begegnung nachgedacht — und darüber, was danach geschehen ist. Ich kann es kaum erwarten, diese triste Farbe abzuschütteln."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, je suis si contente que vous soyez {mf|venu|venue} ! J'étais moi-même à votre recherche. Depuis Dargonus... j'ai l'impression qu'un châle gris anthracite me couvre les épaules. J'ai beaucoup repensé à notre rencontre et à ce qui s'est ensuivi, et j'ai hâte de me débarrasser de cette morne couleur. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, je suis si contente que vous soyez {mf|venu|venue} ! J'étais moi-même à votre recherche. Depuis Dargonus... j'ai l'impression qu'un châle gris anthracite me couvre les épaules. J'ai beaucoup repensé à notre rencontre et à ce qui s'est ensuivi, et j'ai hâte de me débarrasser de cette morne couleur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne iyi ettin de geldin {name}! İtiraf etmeliyim ki ben de seni arıyordum. Dargonus'ta olanlardan sonra... Sanki sırtıma kömür karası bir yük bindi. Tanıştığımız günü ve sonra olanları uzun uzun düşündüm. Bu kasvetli rengi üzerimden atmak için sabırsızlanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is so fortunate you have come! I admit I was seeking you out myself. After the events on Dargonus... it felt like an anthracite grey mantle had dropped on my shoulders. I spent a long time thinking about our very first meeting and what happened next. I cannot wait to shake off this dreary colour."

traits.locale_text: "Ne iyi ettin de geldin {name}! İtiraf etmeliyim ki ben de seni arıyordum. Dargonus'ta olanlardan sonra... Sanki sırtıma kömür renginde bir yük bindi. Tanıştığımız günü ve sonra olanları uzun uzun düşündüm. Bu kasvetli rengi üzerimden atmak için sabırsızlanıyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
